a1: What is so good at them?
a2: Argentina is one of the biggest teams in the world. The best thing for them is to have Messi the best player in the world. I really like this team.

a4: I do not think so he still has a career
q5: Will they ever win a World Cup with Messi ?
a5: Unlikely, as Messi will have one more chance in the 2022 world cup to win.
